item.title: Comment on Acemoglu interview with Times of India by Mark
item.description:
It’s depressing to see a Nobel economist sounding like Robert Reich. He doesn’t even sound intelligently wrong; this is just regurgitated HuffPo op-ed stuff. Another point against transfer of learning being a real thing I guess.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/acemoglu-interview-with-times-of-india.html?commentID=160825141

Post URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/10/acemoglu-interview-with-times-of-india.html?utm_source=rss&utm_medium=rss&utm_campaign=acemoglu-interview-with-times-of-india
